sense.gloss: scolding, reprimand, rebuke, admonition, cautioning, warning
mano-vijnana (mental consciousness, cognizer of sensory information)
care, caution, precaution, looking out (for), watching out (for)
preparation, arrangements, provision, getting ready, laying out (e.g. a meal)
(coming to an) agreement, consent, mutual understanding, accord, consensus

sdata.j: ↑歌詞↑↓かし↓を↑見↑↓み↓てみれば、あまり↑意味↑↓いみ↓が↑無↑↓な↓いことに↑気付↑↓きづ↓くでしょう。
sdata.e: If you look at the lyrics, they don't really mean much.

sdata.j: ↑有意義↑↓ゆういぎ↓な↑回答↑↓かいとう↓とは、↑新↑↓あら↓たな↑疑問↑↓ぎもん↓を↑生↑↓う↓むようなそれである。
sdata.e: The only useful answers are those that raise new questions.

sdata.j: ↑愛↑↓あい↓のない↑人生↑↓じんせい↓など↑全↑↓まった↓く↑無意味↑↓むいみ↓だ。
sdata.e: Life without love is just totally pointless.

sdata.j: ↑学校↑↓がっこう↓↑教育↑↓きょういく↓の↑義務↑↓ぎむ↓↑的↑↓てき↓↑側面↑↓そくめん↓は↑子↑↓こ↓どもの↑学習↑↓がくしゅう↓↑意欲↑↓いよく↓を↑改善↑↓かいぜん↓させる↑様々↑↓さまざま↓な↑研究↑↓けんきゅう↓の↑多↑↓おお↓くの↑取↑↓と↓り↑組↑↓く↓みの↑中↑↓なか↓ではめったに↑分析↑↓ぶんせき↓されない。
sdata.e: The mandatory character of schooling is rarely analyzed in the multitude of works dedicated to the study of the various ways to develop within children the desire to learn.

sdata.j: ↑民主↑↓みんしゅ↓↑主義↑↓しゅぎ↓↑者↑↓しゃ↓というのは、↑多数↑↓たすう↓↑派↑↓は↓の↑意思↑↓いし↓に↑従↑↓したが↓う↑自由↑↓じゆう↓な↑市民↑↓しみん↓だ。
sdata.e: A democrat is a free citizen who yields to the will of the majority.
